title: Clash? Silver? Need Top/Jgl? HERE I AM!
body:
Hi there! 

I am looking for a Clash team that is Stable. And is willing to try absolutely hard. 
I am in Silver 4 currently. And I main Jgl/Top.
Living in Germany but I speak english fluently so communication aint an issue.
Teamspeak/Discord is a Must. Preferably you are all 20+ of age. 
What I look for? A team that is Silver. German/English Speaking and of course Tiltproof people. 

If you are in Need of a Top or Jungle in Silver Elo. Hit me up and we can play :) 

Greets TEA TheBlackOne
